mapper.insert: insert into user_information (email, nickname, phone, password, name, gender, birth_date) values ( #{email}, #{nickname}, #{phone}, #{password}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{birthDate} )
insert into cash_history(cash_history_sequence, account_day, email, cash_point, content, trade_state) values (cash_history_seq.nextval, sysdate, #{email}, #{cashPoint}, #{content}, #{tradeState})
mapper.select: select account_day, cash_point, content, trade_state from cash_history where email=#{email}
select email from user_information where name=#{name} and phone=#{phone}
select password from user_information where name=#{name} and phone=#{phone} and email=#{email}

select w.webtoon_code, w.webtoon_name, w.nickname, w.webtoon_thumbnail, w.webtoon_level, w.webtoon_state from subscription s join webtoon w on (s.webtoon_code = w.webtoon_code) where email=#{email} order by subscription_sequence desc
